property.value: SELECT CONCAT('${objectTypeLabel}:', a.objectName, ' assigned to ', u.fullName) AS title, CONCAT('${objectTypeLabel}:', a.objectName, ' was assigned to ', u.fullName, '. property.name: jpaQuery
property.value: SELECT notification FROM Notification notification WHERE notification.status != 'DELETE' AND notification.created <= :threshold

property.name: jpaQuery
property.value: SELECT CONCAT('${objectTypeLabel}:', ecmf.fileName, ' uploaded in ${parentTypeLabel}:${nameLabel}') AS title, NULL AS note, 'user' AS notificationType, a.objectId AS objectId, a.objectType AS objectType, ecmf.fileName AS objectName, ecmf.fileName AS objectTitle, a.parentObjectId AS relatedObjectId, a.parentObjectType AS relatedObjectType FROM AuditEvent a JOIN AcmUser u ON a.userId = u.userId JOIN EcmFile ecmf ON a.objectId = ecmf.fileId WHERE a.userId = u.userId AND a.eventDate >= :lastRunDate AND a.fullEventType = 'com.armedia.acm.ecm.file.added' AND a.objectType = 'FILE' AND a.eventResult = 'success' AND ecmf.fileType NOT LIKE '%\_xml' ESCAPE '\' ORDER BY a.eventDate
